## use-story & use-case

As a ``super-admin`` -no defined yet-, we are able to access user's borrow domain from ``use/users`` web domain and perform such a operations:

- create a new ``borrow``
- ``borrows`` table
- renovation ``borrow``
- return books, close a ``borrow``
